name: VoiceUnsilenced
description: A Twitter bot that calls someone to read a tweet at them, using the user's name as identification.

BOT_APP_NAME.description: A copy of the app name to use for get requests to the web app portion. Use the same value as you did for the Heroku app name.

CONGRESS_NAMES.description: Comma-separated list of names of Congresspeople to call. Note: Order must match with CONGRESS_NUMBERS.
CONGRESS_NAMES.value: Sen. Thom Tillis,Sen. Richard Burr,Rep. Alma Adams

CONGRESS_NUMBERS.description: Comma-separated list of numbers of Congresspeople listed in CONGRESS_NAMES. Note: Order must match with CONGRESS_NAMES.

TEST_NAME.description: Name of a test person to use in place of a Congressperson in dev mode.

TEST_NUMBER.description: Number to call in place of Congressional phone number in dev mode

TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBERS.description: Comma-separated list of phone numbers with no punctuation, i.e., 5551234567

TWILIO_FROM_NAMES.description: Name of victim on whose behalf calls are made

TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Consumer key for the Twitter app that runs the bot

TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Consumer secret for the Twitter app that runs the bot

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token for the Twitter app that runs this bot

TWITTER_ACCESS_SECRET.description: Access secret for the Twitter app that runs this bot

WAIT_TIME.description: The time to wait in-between calls made by the Twitter bot
